name: Survivor Island
description: Try to survive on this island by collecting resources and building items that will help keep you alive.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista Processor: 2Ghz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 512 MB DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 200 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or higher Processor: 4Ghz+ Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 1 GB DirectX: Version 12 Storage: 200 MB available space
